long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
In the game Talking Tom Differences, you will partially disconnect from the hero, having visited several locations and met terrible toys that have come to life and become dangerous. Your task in Talking Tom is to find the differences within the allotted time. A game that is fun and educational because it will help you improve your observation and concentration skills. You have 20 levels, each level with 7 differences with a set time to complete it.

Introduction
Use mouse or touch the screen!

long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Talking Tom Differences Game is a fun and challenging puzzle game available as a Chrome extension. Join Talking Tom and his friends in a quest to spot the differences between two similar images. With keen observation skills and a sharp eye, you must carefully compare the pictures and identify the variances within a limited time. Each level presents unique and engaging scenes, keeping you entertained and engaged. With its vibrant graphics, delightful animations, and user-friendly interface, "Talking Tom Differences Game" offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to play the game directly in your browser. Test your visual perception skills and have a great time with Talking Tom and his friends in "Talking Tom Differences Game"!
Use mouse or touch the screen!

*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://monkeymart.org
